articles.title: RAM is ruining everything
articles.description: Price hikes related to the memory shortage aren’t just coming for PC gamers; smartphones, laptops, and storage drives could soon get increases, too.

articles.title: The disinformation wars are here
articles.description: An in-depth look at the escalating battle over truth, censorship, and the right-wing push to control the flow of information.
articles.author: Jessica Noble

articles.title: Wake Up Dead Man digs deep for a darker, more powerful Knives Out
articles.description: A review of the Netflix film 'Wake Up Dead Man', analyzing its connection to the 'Knives Out' series.
articles.author: Eric Leibart

articles.title: I’m obsessed with Redfin’s AI search
articles.description: Redfin's new AI-powered search chatbot is surprisingly effective at finding homes based on your needs.
articles.author: Ryan Reynolds

articles.title: Australia boots kids under 16 off social media: how platforms are responding
articles.description: Australia has banned social media use for people under 16, and tech companies are responding with new features and policies.
articles.author: Carla Power

articles.title: The Verge subscription turns one
articles.description: The Verge’s subscription service celebrates its first birthday with a look back at the milestones, reader feedback, and what’s next.
articles.author: Matthew Pearl

articles.title: The AI industry’s biggest week: Google’s rise, RL mania, and a party boat
articles.description: A look at the major AI developments from Neurips 2025, including Google's advancements and the rising popularity of Reinforcement Learning.

articles.title: The Switch’s Virtual Boy Accessory Is Available for Pre-Order
articles.description: You can try to get oneon Nintendo’s website, as spottedby Wario64, though it’s only available for paid Nintendo Switch Online members. Good luck snagging one.

articles.title: Call of Duty won’t release Modern Warfare or Black Ops back to back anymore
articles.description: Activision has announced that it will no longer release Modern Warfare and Black Ops titles back-to-back.

articles.title: Linux is becoming real competition
articles.description: Microsoft seems to have gotten the message thatLinux is becoming real competitionandthatthe Xbox Allyneeds more work! “[W]e will continue refining system behaviors that matter most to gaming: background workload management, power and scheduling improvements, graphics stack optimizations, and updated drivers,”the company writes.

articles.title: holding a hearing to first consider the package
articles.description: A key committee scheduled a markup of 18 bills, including the revised Kids Online Safety Act, for Thursday. That’s just over a week sinceholding a hearing to first consider the package. Afterkilling KOSA last year, the House may be trying to leave its mark before the holiday break.

articles.title: Both sides of the aisle hate the AI moratorium
articles.description: It’s the one of the few things Republicans and Democrats can agree on right now.

articles.title: A first look at Google’s Project Aura glasses built with Xreal
articles.description: Google’s Project Aura glasses are built with Xreal and will provide a new way to interact with Android.

articles.title: The next Pebble gadget is the Index 01, a ring with a microphone
articles.description: The Pebble Index 01 is a smart ring that includes a microphone, designed for productivity and privacy.

articles.title: It’s ugly, it’s beautiful, it’s how you know a game might be a classic
articles.description: Square Enix is making a bold move with HD2D, a series of retro-inspired games that will be released on mobile. The first game, Octopath Traveler, looks and feels like a classic 1980s RPG.
articles.author: Noah Shachtman

articles.title: recently retired from Apple
articles.description: Jeff Williams, whorecently retired from Apple, will stand for election “as a new independent director at the company’s 2026 annual meeting of shareholders,”Disney says.The boardwill be expanded to 11 members.

articles.title: Somehow, this AI-generated McDonald’s ad about hating Christmas was a flop
articles.description: McDonald’s attempted to create a holiday ad using AI, but the result was a critical failure. The video, featuring a robotic Ronald McDonald expressing disdain for Christmas, went viral for all the wrong reasons.

articles.title: Google is powering a new US military AI platform
articles.description: Google is working with the US military to develop a new AI platform based on Gemini, aiming to enhance battlefield intelligence and decision-making.
articles.author: Eamon Kelly

articles.title: Will the SpaceX S-1 finally drive me around the bend
articles.description: SpaceX is planning to go public at a valuation that would make it the biggest listing of all time, Bloomberg reports. “The Elon Musk-led company is targeting a valuation of about $1.5 trillion for the entire company” and while they’re saying they plan for next year, it’s a Musk company so you know what that means: “the timing could slip until 2027.” SpaceX expects $15 billion in 2025 revenue, and $22 billion to $24 billion in 2026, mostly due to Starlink.

articles.title: Some of our favorite gifts will cost you less than $25
articles.description: The Verge's top gift picks under $25 for the holiday season.
articles.author: The Verge Staff

articles.title: CoreWeave CEO defends AI circular deals as ‘working together’
articles.description: CoreWeave CEO defends AI circular deals as ‘working together’
articles.author: lucas.ropek

articles.title: Unconventional AI confirms its massive $475M seed round
articles.description: Unconventional AI, a company building a large language model for enterprise, has raised $475 million in a seed round.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: Hinge CEO steps down to launch Overtone, an AI dating app
articles.description: Hinge's CEO Justin McLeod is stepping down to launch Overtone, an AI-powered dating app.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Fal nabs $140M in fresh funding led by Sequoia, tripling valuation to $4.5B
articles.description: Fal, a fintech company, has raised $140M in a new funding round led by Sequoia Capital, significantly increasing its valuation to $4.5B.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: Cashew Research is going after the $90B market research industry with AI
articles.description: Cashew Research is a new AI-powered platform that is challenging the traditional market research industry. It leverages AI to provide faster and more accurate insights.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: Max Hodak is more worried about Twitter than brain-computer interface hacking
articles.description: TechCrunch podcast featuring Max Hodak discussing his concerns about Twitter's future and the potential for it to become a haven for misinformation, rather than the risks of brain-computer interface hacking.
articles.author: David Riggs

articles.title: SpaceX reportedly planning 2026 IPO with $1.5T valuation target
articles.description: SpaceX is reportedly planning to go public in 2026 with a $1.5 trillion valuation target.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: B Capital founding partner Kabir Narang leaves to launch new investment platform
articles.description: B Capital founding partner Kabir Narang is launching a new investment platform after leaving his previous role.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: Why Cursor’s CEO believes OpenAI, Anthropic competition won’t crush his startup
articles.description: Cursor CEO, Daniel Michael, argues that his startup's focus on providing a "human-in-the-loop" AI solution will prevent OpenAI and Anthropic from dominating the market.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Rivian is building its own AI assistant
articles.description: Rivian is developing an AI assistant to improve the driving experience and operational efficiency of its electric vehicles.
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.title: Three in 10 US teens use AI chatbots every day, but safety concerns are growing
articles.description: A new report reveals that a significant portion of US teens are using AI chatbots daily, while worries about safety and responsible use are escalating.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Slack CEO Denise Dresser to join OpenAI as chief revenue officer
articles.description: Slack CEO Denise Dresser is set to join OpenAI as its chief revenue officer.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Boom Supersonic raises $300M to build natural gas turbines for Crusoe data centers
articles.description: Boom Supersonic raises $300M to build natural gas turbines for Crusoe data centers
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: Amazon’s Ring rolls out controversial, AI-powered facial-recognition feature to video doorbells
articles.description: Amazon’s Ring is rolling out its controversial AI-powered facial recognition feature to its video doorbells, allowing users to identify visitors.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Truecaller now lets users protect households from scam calls
articles.description: Truecaller has launched a new feature to protect households from scam calls.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: Ford and Renault team up on cheaper EVs in a ‘fight for our lives’
articles.description: Ford and Renault are collaborating to develop more affordable electric vehicles, citing the urgency of the climate crisis.
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.title: Google Photos launches new video editing tools
articles.description: Google Photos is rolling out new video editing tools to its users.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: NASA and USPS stop using Canoo EVs despite CEO’’s pledged support
articles.description: NASA and USPS have ended their contracts with Canoo to use its electric vehicles, despite the CEO's promises of support.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: OpenAI, Anthropic, and Block join new Linux Foundation effort to standardize the AI agent era
articles.description: OpenAI, Anthropic, and Block are teaming up with the Linux Foundation to establish standards for the rapidly evolving AI agent landscape.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Fairphone refreshes its good-looking, repairable headphones
articles.description: Fairphone has launched a new range of repairable headphones that are designed to be sustainable and durable.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta
